It is imperative that the Spirit Realm that's been
tainted, is restored to its former glory.
The Dwelling of Spirits cleansing can be performed
by command channels with 15-100 adventurers
of Lv. 76 and higher.
Weaker warriors won't be able to complete the mission.
The raid last for 30 min., and every Wednesday
the zone is reset, so you can go there once a week.
